sentence.idiomatic: If an emergency situation arises, immediately report it to the police.
People in our profession often have to deal with unforseen incidents that arise suddenly.
Yesterday evening his grandfather had a sudden heart attack and died.
Media reports often leave people unable to distiguish what is true and what is not.
He often reads economic reports, so his news is very up-to-date.
According to the Central Weather Bureau report, this area will be getting the first snowfall of this year.
The typhoon destroyed many homes, leaving a lot of people homeless.
Recently the police brought down a huge smuggling ring.
His words destroyed my confidence.
China is a huge market.
The news resources on the internet are immense.
His father left him a huge inheritance.
Yesterday I uncovered an astonishing secret.
After he went abroad astonishing changes took place.
The speed at which the housing prices rose in this area is simply astonishing.
We get along really well. Don't come here and try to destroy our relationship.
His sudden appearance ruined my plan.
Mankind must stop destroying the environment; if not, there will be tremendous harm done.
The management of their company is very chaotic.
The scene of the car accident is very chaotic. The police have already rushed there to deal with it.
My mind is a mess right now. Give me a little time to think things through.

word.literal: to go on a business trip

sentence.idiomatic: The boss is sending me to Hong Kong next week for a business trip.
The situation there is very dangerous. I'm not comfortable sending you there alone.
The government assigned a lot of police to look after his security.
Ladies and gentlemen, this is a breaking news report.
Our station just received news that Godzilla has just arrived in Shanghai from Japan.
He is now downtown, destroying buildings, and eating anyone he sees.
Our reporter tells us that Godzilla is huge, with terrifying strength.
The places he has passed through have been destroyed.
The whole city is in chaos.
The government has already dispatched the military.
If you see Godzilla, please run away as fast as you can.
Ah, Godzilla!
